obiee.audit.webcat.core

Class StandardSecuritySettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • obiee.audit.webcat.core.StandardSecuritySettings

  • public class StandardSecuritySettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the out of the box permissions and weighing values to encode user access level to OBI objects
    Author:
    danielgalassi@gmail.com

      • matchClosestWeighingForValue

        public int matchClosestWeighingForValue(int param)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds the closest out of the box weighing value for a given aggregated permission value
        Parameters:
        param - an aggregated weighing value
        Returns:
        closest out of the box weighing value or 0.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if weighing parameter is outside bounds

      • getPermissionForValue

        public java.lang.String getPermissionForValue(int param)
        Find the permission for given weighing value
        Parameters:
        param - weighing value
        Returns:
        the permission description or null if no permission is found for the passed value
